items.sentence: It seemed as if the outside world would disappear every time Tom strummed his acoustic guitar.
Recently we seem to just keep missing each other. I never seem to be able to meet up with him.
A cellar was dug on top of the hill and they slowly moved the house from the road to the hill.
No matter how strange it may seem to us, it doesn't seem strange to the people who live there.
If we were supposed to talk more than listen, we would have been given two mouths and one ear.
